text:
The flashy city lights wash away
the faint starlight.
From that night sky, a flashy sound reverberates.

name: Young Man's Voice
text:
...Tch.
Every single night, they never get tired of it.
...So goddamn stupid.

Without even looking up at the sound,
the ground in front of his downcast face
changes color.

Are these flashy colors fireworks,
or just the city lights?
He didn't care, and he wasn't interested.

name: Tourist's Voice
text:
Wow—!
Look, look, fireworks!
They're so beautiful!

name: Tourist's Voice
text:
Apparently, they go off somewhere in the city almost every day.
The whole city is sparkling,
I'm really glad we came to Tesfinito!

name: Tourist's Voice
text:
Hotels, casinos, show stages...
The whole city is like a festival all the time!
...Oops, we should get going soon.

name: Tourist's Voice
text:
I'm looking forward to the magic show!
He's the guy you see online all the time, right?
Wow, I'm getting excited!

Beyond his downcast gaze, on the ground that changes to flashy colors,
a black shadow casts itself, scattering noise around.
That noise is also quickly drowned out by the sound of fireworks.

name: Young Man's Voice
text:
...Tch, what a crappy city.
Everywhere is gaudily shining,
and everyone is spouting noise.

name: Young Man's Voice
text:
And... In this crappy city,
the only loser who doesn't get caught up
in the lights or the sounds is me... Haha.

The shadow disappears, and a flashy color paints the ground again.
He gets inexplicably angry at that color and kicks the ground.
The light, which was momentarily disturbed, sparkled as if nothing had happened.

I don't remember what day it was.
But that feeling will
probably never disappear.

The light that illuminates me,
the sound that pours down on me.
And I, who am not qualified to receive them.

No matter how much I cry, no matter how much I scream.
It's not even worth to be the howl of a loser,
and I won't even remain in anyone's memory as a loser.

name: Roudin
text: —!!

In a hotel room late at night,
Roudin wakes up with
a voiceless scream.

name: Roudin
text:
A dream... huh.
Ever since I came back,
I haven't had many of them.

Muttering to no one in particular,
he sits up and reaches for the bedside
to clear his hazy mind.

name: Roudin
text:
Really...
Of everything in particular,
why must it be fireworks?

Muttering so, he drinks the water from the bedside,
throws off his clothes to wash away the unpleasant night sweat,
and walks to the shower room.

Chapter 4:
Nobody's Carnival

name: Roudin
text:
Yo, good morning.
I think I'm finally getting used
to waking up early.

The morning after the stream with Wehmalt,
the group gathered at Japan Pavilion,
which was projecting a clear blue sky overhead.

name: Barrel
text:
Good morning, everyone~!
Man, yesterday was super exciting~!

name: Turbak
text:
Good morning, everyone!
I was just talking to the staff, and they said the number of guests
has increased even more since yesterday's stream!

options.text: Good morning, everyone!
Was the increase that noticable?
The promotional effect of the stream is amazing...

name: Roudin
text:
Oh, about that.
There's something I want you to see.
Ah... Here it is.

Roudin operates the device in his hand
and turns the displayed screen to the group.

name: Barrel
text:
Eh... Um...
Is this some kind of data~?
T-There are so many numbers, my head is spinning...

name: Roudin
text:
It's the visitor data for each pavilion,
compiled by S&S Heroes.
Nessen and Astosis put it together for me.

name: Roudin
text:
Well... I got the data from the office,
but I told them I'm not good at looking at numbers,
so they made it easy to understand.

name: Turbak
text:
That's a relief, I also tried to open the data
that came from the office, but...
I got a headache and closed it right away!

options.text: Well, do I take a look?
An overwhelming lack of administrative skills...!?
I'm not great with numbers either!

name: Roudin
text:
That's what our colleagues in the agency are for.
Even I, who am bad at numbers,
somehow manage to understand it now?

As he says and laughs, Roudin touches the
displayed data, and the numbers change into
an easy-to-read graph.

name: Barrel
text:
Oh, amazing~!
With this, even I can
understand it~!!

name: Turbak
text:
Um, according to this data...
Wow, it's growing so much!
It's not inferior to the other pavilions at all!

options.text: It's a steady increase!
I think it's a good pace!
I'm glad we worked hard...!

name: Roudin
text:
Well, as you can see.
I was worried about what would happen,
but for now, it seems to be fine.

name: Barrel
text:
So, that means the mission we
received to liven up Japan Pavilion
is accomplished for now~!

name: Barrel
text:
But, it's still just the beginning~!
Since we're at it, I want to make this
the most exciting festival~!!

Barrel says as he beams.
The group also smiles at his words
and nods enthusiastically.

name: Roudin
text:
Haha, just don't get too fired up and get tired.
Well then, I'm counting on you again today...
At least, that's what I'd like to say.

name: Turbak
text:
There's no exchange stream scheduled for today.
I talked a little about it with [Player]-kun yesterday—

name: Turbak
text:
I just couldn't get the schedule
to work out with the other party.
So, I'd like to make today a free day.

options.text: Free day, huh? I wonder what I'll do.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text: You've had to bear the burden of observation even outside of the exhibition matches, so please rest well, okay?

options.text: I feel restless when I have nothing to do...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahaha, I know what you mean.
It's such a lively event, so you feel like there might be something else you can do, right!?

options.text: Is it okay if I help with the festival stalls?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, that's right!
Since the number of guests is increasing, maybe we should help with the stalls~?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, you don't have to worry about that.
We're increasing the number of staff to match the number of visitors!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
We've gathered a team of customer service pros, so leave it to them.
Just relax and enjoy your free day.

name: Barrel
text:
Free day...
Do you all have any plans or
something you're thinking of doing~?

name: Turbak
text:
About that...
If you all don't have any plans,
why don't we go see another pavilion?

name: Barrel
text:
Oh, that sounds great~!
The festivals we went to for the stream were super fun,
so I'd like to see some others~!

name: Roudin
text:
I'll tag along, since I don't have any plans either.
So, Turbak-san,
do you have a pavilion in mind?

name: Turbak
text:
Yeah, Fortina Pavilion.
It's a hot topic on the Internet right now,
but I don't really know what kind of festival it is.

options.text: Fortina...?
I've never heard of that place.
A hot topic online?

name: Turbak
text:
Ah, sorry!
I should have explained the pavilion first.
Um...

At [Player]'s question,
Turbak looks flustered, and
begins to talk about the pavilion.

name: Turbak
text:
Fortina is a developing planet
in the Sunflower Galaxy, and
it's a base city, apparently.

name: Barrel
text:
Apparently...?
I've never heard of it either...

name: Turbak
text:
It's still a planet under development,
so it's not accepting tourists.
That's why there's no much details.

name: Barrel
text:
Hmm?
But if they're participating in the event,
that means that city has a festival, right~?

Barrel raises another question,
and Turbak smiles back
and continues to explain.

name: Turbak
text:
That's right!
Fortina, like the moon, is a planet
with no native residents.

name: Turbak
text:
The pioneers share their hardships
and gain vitality for tomorrow—

name: Turbak
text:
They planned a festival like that
and created a new one.
I'm curious what kind of festival it is!

name: Turbak
text:
...Though to tell you the truth,
I don't know the details of the festival myself.

name: Roudin
text:
Fortina's participation was decided
right before the event. They barely got in
on a slot that opened up from a cancellation.

name: Roudin
text:
That's why they couldn't finish preparing
the pavilion in time for the opening.
Today is its first unveiling.

name: Turbak
text:
I saw the planning documents as an organizer,
but you can't really know what a festival is like
unless you see it in person, right?

name: Roudin
text:
A newly created festival...
But, Turbak.
I thought—

name: Roudin
text:
You were only interested in
traditional festivals, like the
ones you've seen so far.

At Roudin's words,
Turbak shakes his head
and replies with a smile.

name: Turbak
text:
It's true that traditional festivals are great.
The star and the people are connected, and history
creates customs and traditions... But.

name: Turbak
text:
To think about a festival, and the star with its people
searching for new connections and memories.
I think that's also a very happy thing!

options.text: I see...
Is that how it is..?
I'm getting a little curious.

name: Barrel
text:
Somehow, hearing that story
makes me really curious~!
Let's go check it out~!!

name: Roudin
text:
[Player], what about you?
It's a free day today,
so I'm not going to force you, but...

name: Turbak
text:
If possible, I'd like you to come with us.
I want to make as many memories
as possible with all of you!

options.text: In that case, I'll go too!
I don't have any other plans...
Let's conquer all the festivals together!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's a great idea!
Let's go see all the different festivals together during this event!

name: Turbak
text:
Well then, let's get going.
It's just around Japan Pavilion's corner.
Everyone, follow me.

Led by Turbak,
the group leaves Japan Pavilion
and walks through the event venue.

Arriving at the pavilion shortly after,
Turbak stops walking
and turns to the group.

The first thing that greeted the group
when they arrived at the pavilion was
the clamor and laughter of many people.

And what came into view were
amusement park rides like a roller coaster,
a Ferris wheel, and a merry-go-round.

options.text: Um, an amusement park?
This is the same event venue, right?
This is, a new festival...?

name: Turbak
text:
Um, this is.
A festival...?

name: Roudin
text:
Oh, it's pretty lively.
Is it like a traveling amusement park?
It reminds me of when I was a kid.

name: Barrel
text:
Yeah~.
One used to come to my neighborhood too,
though I almost never got to go~.

name: Roudin
text:
What, Barrel.
Weren't you interested in your
local carnival or something?

name: Barrel
text:
Well, the main venue was in a pretty rough area.
Apparently, I was almost kidnapped once before
I was old enough to remember, so maybe that's why~.

name: Barrel
text:
Don't stand out where there are a lot of people.
Don't go near dangerous people or things,
I was told that all the time as a kid~.

name: Roudin
text:
...I see.
Sorry for bringing up
bad memories, Barrel.

name: Barrel
text:
You don't have to apologize, Roudin-san!
It was a long time ago, and my grandma
doted on me a lot to make up for it~!

name: Barrel
text:
Besides, thanks to that local carnival,
I happened to see a western movie that was showing,
and that's how I got here today~!!

Barrel brushes off Roudin's apology
with his usual cheerful smile.
And he turns back to the group.

name: Barrel
text:
More importantly, let's go to the new festival~!
I'm a festival-loving man who loves festival stalls,
but I also love, love, love amusement parks~!!

As he says, his tail wags, and with a huge smile,
he starts walking, and the group follows
Barrel's lead and steps into the pavilion.

options.text: It's really an amusement park...
This might be fun in its own way!
I might get tired from all the people...

text:
The group proceeds through the pavilion, which is bustling
with people, and at that moment, several shadows
simultaneously approach and surround them.

name: Turbak
text:
Um, mechs... right?
There seem to be a lot of them...

In front of the surprised group, a large number of small mechs
start moving in unison and start calling
out to the group in mechanical voices.

name: Guide-kun
text:
GWAHAHAHA!
WELCOME, WELCOME!!
THE FORTINA PAVILION IS THE BEST!!!

name: Excitement-kun
text:
COME ON IN, TAKE A LOOK!
IT'S A WELCOMING DANCE, YO!!

options.text: Ooh, what a warm welcome!
Their dancing is so sharp!?
I've heard that laugh somewhere before...

text:
The group freezes, unable to comprehend the situation,
and at that moment, a familiar voice
reaches them, casually pushing aside the mechs.

name: Sensettia
text:
Alright, alright, that's enough!
Honestly, you've made too many of them without thinking.
You're blocking the customers' way.

name: Sensettia
text:
Sorry to startle you,
welcome to Fortina Pavilion!
Here, a complimentary welcome drink.

name: Sensettia
text:
The appearance is a bit... well, pretty bad,
but it'll blow away your fatigue and everything?
...Wait.

options.text: Sensettia!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sensettia
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]!?
Eh, what are you doing here...
Wait, no.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sensettia
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's been a while, I'm glad to see you're doing well.
Are you here for sightseeing or something?

options.text: It's been a while, are you doing well?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sensettia
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]!?
Eh, what are you doing here...
Wait, no.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sensettia
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's been a while, I'm glad to see you're doing well.
Are you here for sightseeing or something?

options.text: By the way, that drink, could it be...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sensettia
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, this?
It's a homemade drink from one of the guys helping out at our pavilion.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sensettia
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It looks bad, but it's pretty good, I recommend it.
Al... chemy...?
I think he said he made it with that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sensettia
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Hey!
Shouldn't you say something else first!
It's been a while since we've seen each other!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sensettia
dialogue_after_selection.text:
So, [Player]!
It's been a while, I'm glad to see you're doing well.
Are you here for sightseeing or something?

text:
Surprised, but happy to reunite,
Sensettia and [Player].
The heroes accompanying them call out.

name: Roudin
text:
Oh, a friend?
I'm Roudin, nice to meet you.
I'm with the organizers, S&S Heroes.

name: Sensettia
text:
Um, I'm Sensettia.
I met this fella on a different
star before, on a little job.

name: Turbak
text:
I'm Turbak, from S&S Heroes, nice to meet you!
But still... [Player],
you really know a lot of people!!

name: Barrel
text:
You knew everyone we met at
the pavilions yesterday, too,
you've got some amazing connections...

options.text: Well, it's just a coincidence, I guess...
I go on a lot of business trips.
We were together at the beach house, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sensettia
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right, Barrel, long time no see!
How are Esperdica and the others?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's been a while~!!
I've been going to the shop with Furlong every now and then since then, they're doing great~!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text: Alphecca-san also said he wanted to come visit Orient City again~!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sensettia
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, really? That's great.
Tell him to let me know if he finds any other good part-time jobs!

text:
In a lively atmosphere, the group
finishes exchanging greetings,
and Turbak cuts to the chase.

name: Turbak
text:
So, Sensettia-kun, if you're helping out here,
does that mean you're a resident of Fortina too?

name: Sensettia
text:
Me, from Fortina?
I wouldn't really say so myself?
I'm just participating as a helper.

name: Turbak
text:
Then, you're the same as us!
You're a friend of [Player]-kun,
so does that mean you're a hero too?

name: Sensettia
text:
M-Me, a hero!?
W-Well.
...That's, you know!

name: Sensettia
text:
([Player], please!
I may be a villain, but please
put some good words about me...)

Gwahahaha!
There are no 'heroes'
in this pavilion!!

options.text: That voice...!
Well, he's here too, huh?
Viscunam!

name: Viscunam
text:
It's been a while, [Player]!
I'm glad to see you're healthy, and as
my test subject, that's a good mindset to have!

name: Viscunam
text:
And you, over there,
did you ask if we were heroes?

name: Turbak
text:
Ah, yes.
And yet, you didn't announce your
participation in the exhibition match...

name: Viscunam
text:
There's no way we would.
After all, the people here are
'volunteer' cooperators.

name: Viscunam
text:
Well, to the people of the world?
Reluctantly, we're referred to
as villains, though.

name: Sensettia
text:
Why are you revealing it yourself!?
Give me back my hard-earned efforts!!

name: Viscunam
text:
Ouch!?
Don't just pinch a person's belly fat, young lady!
It's not like it's something to hide!

At Viscunam's sudden remark,
the group from Japan Pavilion
is uniformly surprised.

name: Turbak
text:
V-Villains!?
Um, I should contact headquarters...
Wait, should I fight them first?

name: Barrel
text:
Calm down, Turbak-san~!
In this case, even if they're villains, as long as they
don't transform and act, it's not a problem~!

name: Roudin
text:
...This is a surprise.
Hey, how did you get your event
application approved?

name: Roudin
text:
Even if it's a gathering of festivals from all over the galaxy,
the staff of the participating pavilions
should have had a background check.

name: Viscunam
text:
Ah, about that.
Of course, we passed the screening
through the proper procedures. After all...

As for us, the applicant,
the government of Fortina,
has vouched for us.

options.text: Well, I thought he'd be here.
So that drink really was...

name: Theoreol
text:
It's been a while, [Player].
To think we'd meet again here, this looks
like it will be an interesting eveNT!

options.text: It's been a while, Theoreol!
No, no, no, wait a minute!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Theoreol
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My clothes, you asK?
As you can see, I'm wearing them... No.
You're asking about the origin of these clothes, I presuME.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Theoreol
dialogue_after_selection.text: These clothes were prepared for me when I met Rakta the other daY.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Theoreol
dialogue_after_selection.text: I visited him to request a safety guarantee for a newly created chemical, and we ended up talking about this eveNT.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Theoreol
dialogue_after_selection.text: He arranged it so that if I were to participate, I could blend in with the other tourists and carry out my activitiES.

options.text: Theoreol, what's with those clothes!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Theoreol
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My clothes, you asK?
As you can see, I'm wearing them... No.
You're asking about the origin of these clothes, I presuME.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Theoreol
dialogue_after_selection.text: These clothes were prepared for me when I met Rakta the other daY.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Theoreol
dialogue_after_selection.text: I visited him to request a safety guarantee for a newly created chemical, and we ended up talking about this eveNT.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Theoreol
dialogue_after_selection.text: He arranged it so that if I were to participate, I could blend in with the other tourists and carry out my activitiES.

text:
After exchanging greetings and light
introductions, Theoreol turns to the group
and calmly continues his explanation.

name: Theoreol
text:
As Barrel was just saying,
those of us who are called villains are not
arrested on sight just for existiNG.

name: Barrel
text:
Of course~, unauthorized
transformation is what's illegal.
So, even if they're a villain—

name: Barrel
text:
An organization with a certain qualification...
Like a hero agency, or the government~.
If they vouch for you, even transformation is legal~.

name: Barrel
text:
It seems to require a lot of troublesome
contracts and procedures, so it's not
something that happens often~.

note: I'd love to imagine Huckle holding his head at the table everytime we transform a villain

options.text: Ah, I've done that so many times...
President... I'm sorry for all the trouble...!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
O-Oi, what's wrong!?
I don't really get it, but if you want to apologize to your President, you should make time for it after the event, okay?

options.text: I was just approving it on a whim, but there was that kind of procedure...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sensettia
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]... You.
I'm not one to talk, but you should probably thank your office staff sometime.

name: Theoreol
text:
The fact that we are present in this event,
means that a lot of troublesome contracts
and procedures have been completeD.

name: Sensettia
text:
That's right.
The developing planet Fortina doesn't
have a hero agency or anything yet.

name: Sensettia
text:
So, a request for help with the
event was posted on the Internet,
and we accepted it.

name: Sensettia
text:
We don't have any criminal records,
and the organizers' background check?
They didn't say anything about that.

The group nods at Sensettia's explanation,
and Turbak raises a question.

name: Turbak
text:
I see, I understand the situation.
So, in the end, what exactly is this
festival supposed to be about?

name: Barrel
text:
I'm curious about that too~!
It looks more like an amusement park
than a festival...

name: Viscunam
text:
Kukuku... It seems you're curious!
About the pavilion produced by the
volunteering genius scientist, yours truly, Viscunam!!

name: Sensettia
text:
You just made what was on the proposal!
...Well, that's amazing enough, though.

name: Viscunam
text:
Fufufu, don't praise me so much, young lady!
In short, this pavilion is on a whole
other level from your average festival!

name: Roudin
text:
Hey, hey, that's a pretty big claim!
I admit the amusement park is
well-made, but... Wait.

name: Roudin
text:
If you look closely, it's really amazing!?
That roller coaster is
moving in an incredible way!?

name: Barrel
text:
That merry-go-round, it looks like
the horses are running on their own~,
or am I just imagining it~...?

name: Viscunam
text:
Gwahahaha!
With that good eye you've had,
you should praise me some more!!

name: Theoreol
text:
I've been told to keep the details confidential,
but it's a safe and secure design by a volunteering
genius scientist and an alchemist, yeS?

options.text: There's not a single element of safety in that!?
These people don't have a criminal record...?
No, I'm really curious, though!

name: Roudin
text:
A-Ahem!
We got sidetracked, but.
Even if the amusement park is amazing...

name: Roudin
text:
It's still a bit much to attract
attention just with that, isn't it?

name: Barrel
text:
Yeah~,
the most exciting part
is the exhibition match~.

name: Roudin
text:
And, we've started streaming in collaboration with other
heroes, so the hero fever is rising within the event.
To surpass that...

name: Viscunam
text:
Kukuku... Hero fever, you say?
That's fine, all the more reason
for this festival to be exciting.

name: Sensettia
text:
Set all the details aside for now!
Just watch, I'm telling you,
you'll definitely enjoy it!!

At the heroes' words,
Viscunam and the others smile
and reply. At that moment—

name: Guest
text:
W-What are you doing!?
Stop it!!

name: Mafia
text:
Hey, hey, don't make such a fuss.
I'm just asking you to treat me
to some popcorn.

name: Guest
text:
Why should I treat you!
No way!!
Hey, give me back my bag!!

name: Villain
text:
Hehe, you've got quite a bit in here.
Well then, thanks for the treat!

Suddenly, the guests' screams and
the clamor echo through the pavilion.
And the next moment—

name: Barrel
text:
Whoa, hold it right there~!
You're under arrest for extortion and robbery,
so come along quietly~!!

Barrel reacts first and starts running.
However, three shadows
proceed to block his path.

name: Theoreol
text:
That's far enough, Barrel.
In this place, your interference
is not requireD.

name: Sensettia
text:
That's right.
This is this pavilion's 'entertainment'.
Won't you stay out of this?

name: Barrel
text:
What are you talking about~!!
If you won't move,
I'll force my way through~!!

name: Viscunam
text:
Honestly, you bark so much without
even assessing the situation.
If you think you can, then do as you will.

At the three who suddenly stood in his way,
Barrel glares at them with an angry
expression, looking for an opening.

name: Turbak
text:
[Player]-kun,
I need you to transform me.
...I have to make sure.

name: Roudin
text:
...[Player], I'm counting on you too.
I kind of get the situation, but first,
we need to calm this place down.

options.text: I don't really get what's going on, but!
I'll approve the transformation for now!
Ah... I think I get it now.

name: (Mobile Device)
text:
—Connect path?
To start operation,
please tap 'OK'.

options.text: OK

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I'm asking you to come along quietly~!
You are, under arrest~!!

name: Sensettia
text:
I told you not to interfere!
Oh c'mon, you guys help out too!
Anonymous, transformation please!!

name: Theoreol
text:
It's a bit reluctant, but we'll
have you behave yourselvES!
Battle Start

name: Viscunam
text:
Guha!?
T-That's enough!
That's enough, so stop, stop!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I don't have time to deal with you~!
If you don't want to be dragged off,
get out of the way right now~!

Barrel starts running with a fierce expression.
However, he is stopped by
Roudin's voice calling from behind.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Just a second, Barrel!!
This is all 'staged'.
Calm down and take a good look.

name: Mafia
text:
Gwah!?
S-So strong!?

name: Villain
text:
T-To think a civilian would
beat us... Y-You're a
hero from now on too... *gasp*.

Barrel stops at Roudin's words.
In his line of sight, a guest who was just
passing by was defeating the villains.

name: Guest Whose Bag Was Taken
text:
Congratulations!
With this, you're a hero from today onwards!!
Ah, here's a commemorative item. Please accept.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Eh... Um.
What in the world
is going on~?

options.text: So it's not a problem, right?
Please explain in detail!
I see, this pavilion's entertainment, huh?

text:
With the situation calmed down for now,
the group cancels their transformation and waits
for an explanation from Sensettia and the others.

name: Sensettia
text:
As you can see, it's a 'villain' guerrilla live show.
The staff, transformed like that, attack
the staff playing the victim role, and...

name: Sensettia
text:
The guests on the scene
can defeat the villains
and become heroes.

name: Viscunam
text:
The staff of this pavilion are
not affiliated with any hero agency,
nor have they become villains.

name: Viscunam
text:
It's made up of those kinds of people.
Well, it seems they call themselves
Nethers, or something.

name: Theoreol
text:
May they be heroes or villains,
they are not very well-known, so it's rare
for anyone to know who the staff arE.

name: Sensettia
text:
It's a guerrilla live show that takes advantage of that.
Those who rush towards the trouble,
like Barrel just now—

name: Sensettia
text:
Can easily defeat the villains
and become heroes themselves.
Ah, here's the pamphlet.

As Roudin says, he nods with
admiration while displaying the data
sent to his device.

name: Roudin
text:
I see, so you're taking advantage of
the hero fever, not to cheer for heroes,
but to become one yourself.

name: Barrel
text:
O-Oh... So that's what...
I'm sorry for rushing in without checking...

name: Sensettia
text:
There's no need to apologize!
We didn't explain it to you beforehand.
We're sorry too, you know?

name: Roudin
text:
But still...
Nethers, was it?
How did you gather so many people?

At Roudin's question,
Sensettia and the others
continue their explanation.

name: Theoreol
text:
That's because the planning for
this event was done within Anonymous.
That's the reasON.

options.text: Anonymous...?
You said that when you transformed, too, right?
I've only heard the name before...

name: Viscunam
text:
It's a network service mainly used by
those who are unaffiliated with an agency.
It's not open to the public, though.

name: Sensettia
text:
There's always an unaffiliated 'Observer'
logged into Anonymous,
so we're asking them to transform us.

name: Barrel
text:
It's what you'd call an underground network~.
The operator is unknown, and even the police
haven't been able to grasp the full picture~.

name: Sensettia
text:
We don't really get it either.
Well, we use it because it's convenient
for gathering information and transforming.

name: Barrel
text:
So, what's this about the festival
at this pavilion originating from Anonymous~?

name: Viscunam
text:
Originally, one topic was getting
a lot of attention within Anonymous.
To create the best, virtual festival at GCE.

name: Sensettia
text:
You know how it is online, right?
A small, casual post can
really blow up in popularity.

name: Viscunam
text:
This time, it started with that kind of post.
But as the opening of GCE approached,
Anonymous got really excited!

name: Viscunam
text:
So much so that they hammered out the details
of this amusement park and the guerrilla live shows.
All as part of a virtual game.

options.text: Ah... That is common online.
So that's what happened.
I kind of wanted to participate.

name: Sensettia
text:
Just as it was getting exciting,
someone claiming to be from Fortina suddenly
asked if we'd participate under their name.

name: Sensettia
text:
After that, Anonymous got into
a festive mood, and it all
came together in no time.

name: Theoreol
text:
So, when Fortina officially
recruited staff, many
applied from Anonymous.

name: Sensettia
text:
The three of us weren't really interested
in this topic, and we only learned about
the details after the request came in, but—

name: Sensettia
text:
The Nethers here have been involved in
this festival since the planning stages
and applied to be here.

Sensettia explains how she came to participate
in the pavilion with a happy expression.
Her face momentarily clouds over.

name: Sensettia
text:
...You know, most Nethers
usually hide the fact that
they can transform.

name: Sensettia
text:
To suddenly be able to transform,
and then be forced to choose between
being a hero or a villain—

name: Sensettia
text:
Some are scared to fight, or don't want the
form of their dreams to be exposed to the
galaxy. There are those who can't choose.

name: Roudin
text:
...That's true.
Just because you are a hero, doesn't
mean you'd want to fight Kaibutsu.

name: Sensettia
text:
This time, it's a project that even people like that can
do by making use of their transformation abilities,
so that's part of why it got so popular!

Barrel, who had been listening quietly to her words,
nods quietly and replies.

name: Barrel
text:
I get the situation~.
But, since Anonymous is involved, as a police officer,
I can't just leave it as is~.

name: Barrel
text:
The local... moon police are also involved
in the background checks, so I don't think
there's a problem~, but—

name: Barrel
text:
I'll have to share this with the police~.
We might have to re-investigate the staff
and strengthen the security patrols~.

name: Viscunam
text:
Hmph, do as you please.
Even if Anonymous is the source of the project,
we're operating completely within the bounds of the law.

name: Barrel
text:
I've said a lot of things~,
but personally, I'm rooting
for the Nethers~!

name: Sensettia
text:
I'll prove it with the success of the pavilion.
You guys should play around too!

options.text: In that case, by all means!
I'll just watch from the sidelines for now.
...I can't trust you all completely just yet.

text:
Nodding at [Player]'s words,
Sensettia and the others are about
to guide them through the pavilion.

At that moment, Turbak, who had been listening
quietly to everyone's conversation without
saying a word, speaks up.

name: Turbak
text:
Hey, tell me.
This festival...
Who exactly is it for?

name: Theoreol
text:
...That's an interesting question, Turbak.
May I ask for the details
of your intentiON?

name: Turbak
text:
Ah, no!
I'm not saying that this pavilion's
festival is bad or anything.

name: Turbak
text:
The guests are really excited, and
I think it's a fun pavilion.
But...

name: Turbak
text:
A festival of a star, the people of that star,
wouldn't they have created the festival to root themselves
to that star, and connect themselves to it?

name: Turbak
text:
To create a fictional festival online,
and say that it's Fortina's festival...!?
...Sorry, I don't really get it.

As Turbak speaks quietly with a trembling voice,
the atmosphere of the place becomes silent.

name: Theoreol
text:
I see, I understand your questiON.
The festival you define, Turbak, is one that comes
from the activities of the people on that stAR.

name: Theoreol
text:
Then, let me ask you in retuRN.
Where do you draw the line between the activities
of the star and the activities of the peoplE?

name: Turbak
text:
That's...
The people who live on the star think about it,
and pass it down among the residents...

name: Theoreol
text:
If this event remains in Fortina
and continues to be held as a festival,
can't it be said to be an activity of the people of that stAR?

At Theoreol's words,
Turbak looks down like he's holding himself back.
Theoreol continues to add more words.

name: Theoreol
text:
On the stars I've traveled to,
there are many customs and festivals created
by the residents who moved there latER.

name: Turbak
text:
B-But that's!
Even if they moved, those people
are still residents of their old stars...

name: Theoreol
text:
You're saying that who created it is importaNT.
But, accepting what people from outside the star
created and making it their owN—

name: Theoreol
text:
In that process, the activities of the people
are mixed, eliminated, in which new activities
are born, and then they take rooT.

name: Theoreol
text:
That too is an activity
of the people of that stAR.
That's how I define iT.

name: Turbak
text:
Ah... That's right.
No matter what the trigger was,
the people of Fortina accepted it.

name: Turbak
text:
If that becomes Fortina's festival,
a custom that takes root there,
then that's a very happy thing, isn't it!?

At Theoreol's words,
Turbak smiles broadly,
and then his face saddens.

name: Turbak
text:
But still...
I can't see the connection between
this festival and the people of Fortina.

name: Turbak
text:
...Sorry.
I'm going to go cool down a little.
Let's call it a day for today.

options.text: Turbak-san!
(Chase after Turbak)
I know what you want to say, but...

name: Roudin
text:
...Let him be alone for now.
Well, I'll make sure to
check on him later.

Restraining [Player],
Roudin quietly watches
Turbak run off.

name: Sensettia
text:
...Well.
I get what he's saying,
but we're...

name: Barrel
text:
I...
I think what both of them
are saying is 'right'...

name: Barrel
text:
But then,
what is a 'right' festival...?
